text:
Dharam Pal Gulati (27 March 1923 – 3 December 2020), also known as Mahashay Dharampal Gulati'", was an Indian businessman, and founder and CEO of MDH ("Mahashian Di Hatti";), an Indian spice company. He was known as the 'spice-king'. He was awarded the Padma Bhushan in 2019. He was known for being the founder and CEO of MDH.
Gulati died on 3 December 2020 at a hospital in Delhi of a cardiac arrest at the age of 97.
